LanguageData.Autodoor.label: Car door
LanguageData.Autodoor.description: Different salt. Energy-related variables. -colonists can pass without slowing.
LanguageData.Door.label: The door
LanguageData.Door.description: In the isolation ward. Will open and close the door, to slow down the team. As delay depends on the material used.
LanguageData.Wall.label: Wall
LanguageData.Wall.description: A wall can help wedge the roof.
